alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 9:48AM AKST until February 24 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow, blowing snow, and light freezing rain expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions with visibilities reduced to one half mile or less at times. Snow accumulations up to one inch and trace ice accumulations are expected. * WHERE...Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley. * WHEN...6 PM today to noon Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 40 mph will cause blowing and drifting snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.
